text: Edward Riddell Robson (21 August 1890 – 1977) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1977 deaths Category:People from Northumberland Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Gateshead F.C. players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ed Robson
